name: View the Withdrawal Notice for an NSC and Account where cusomer has decided to close account

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I view the Withdrawal Notice on the following NSC and Account:
| nsc | account |
| 931365 | 06156124 |
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Withdrawal Notice should be returned
| amountAvailableToWithdraw | fundsAvailableStartDate | closureNoticeRecieved | designatedWithdrawalNsc | designatedWithdrawalAccountNumber | fundsAvailableEndDate |
| 0.00 | 2015-11-14 | true | 931365 | 06156041 | 2015-11-15 |

children.description: Validate withdrawal notice: | amountAvailableToWithdraw | fundsAvailableStartDate | closureNoticeRecieved | designatedWithdrawalNsc | designatedWithdrawalAccountNumber | fundsAvailableEndDate | | 0.00 | 2015-11-14 | true | 931365 | 06156041 | 2015-11-15 |

title: View the Withdrawal Notice for an NSC and Account where cusomer has decided to close account
